GSD.description:
usb: dwc3: host: Stop setting the ACPI companion

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 9c185fde906a48368bd2d2a8c17d4b6fb3d670af. For more details please see the references link.
